amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being used to issue a license pursuant to any Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) memo regarding section 5.1.1 of Annex II to the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action of July 14, 2015.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being used to issue a license pursuant to any Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) memo regarding section 5.1.1 of Annex II to the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action of July 14, 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Roskam.
